revised_title: Observations and Conjectures on Spouts in Hatfield
tldr: The author, Abraham de la Pryme, describes his observations of a spout, a natural phenomenon similar to a tornado, that occurred in Hatfield. He provides details about the weather conditions, the appearance of the spout, and its effects on the environment. He also offers conjectures on the cause and nature of spouts, including their relationship to cloud formation and weather patterns.
